description: Tokudawara Gonzou owns a clothing store and is the leader of the Kintetsu Bulls, they are an A-class team that wishes to turn professional and serve as inspiration to AT riders around the world. He constantly wears a set of heavy weights around his stomach to train himself. His entire team is defeated by Agito but he is saved from death by Ikki. He supports Ikki and allows his team to have supplies from his store without charge.
name: Tokudawara Gonzou
